FOOTER_DESCRIPTION: Blaze Hotel is a virtual world for young people where you can design your own character and rooms. You can also meet new friends, chat, party, take care of pets, design and play games, and complete tasks.
INDEX_AB_TITLE: Blaze is a community filled with special users
INDEX_AB_DESC: Join for free, make friends, design your room and enjoy the experience!
INDEX_IB1_DESC: Click on a user, ask them to be your friend and join events together, have fun making rooms and roleplaying!
INDEX_IB2_DESC: Blaze is a free game, you can explore thousands of rooms for free, complete missions, chat, and earn rewards!
INDEX_IB3_DESC: Do you enjoy chatting and hanging out with your friends? Blaze groups, forums, and roleplaying communities are great places to start.
LOGIN_DESC: Hello, we missed you. Log in to play with us!
FORGOT_PASSWORD_DESC: If you have forgotten your password, you can receive an email to reset
FORGOT_PASSWORD_SUCCESS: We have successfully sent you an email
REGISTER_AB_TITLE: Blaze is a community filled with special users
REGISTER_AB_DESC: Join for free, make friends, design your room and enjoy the experience!
REGISTER_ALERTBOX_DESC: Be part of the world's largest online community for teens.
REGISTER_ALERTBOX_TEXT: Do you like chatting and hanging out with your friends? Blaze Groups, forums, and role-playing communities are a great place to start. Join and discover endless role-playing possibilities!
REGISTER_USERNAME_DESC: You'll need to use this username to log in to Blaze in the future. Please use a valid username.
REGISTER_EMAIL_DESC: You can use your own email address to use the 'forgot my password' function.
REGISTER_CHECKBOX_DESC: I agree to the Terms and Conditions, Privacy and Cookie Policy.
REGISTER_ERROR_USERNAME_NVALID: You can't use this username. It can contain a maximum of 15 characters, and you've used forbidden characters.
REGISTER_ERROR_PASSWORD_LENGTH: Password must be at least 6 characters long
HOME_AB_TITLE: Blaze is a community filled with special users.
HOME_AB_DESC: Join for free, make friends, design your room and enjoy the experience!
SETTINGS_AB_DESC: Welcome back, this is the settings page of our hotel. Here, you can change some private information of yourself!
SETTINGS_ALERTBOX_TEXT: Auctor eu augue ut lectus arcu. Tristique nulla aliquet enim tortor at auctor. Pulvinar elementum integer enim neque volutpat ac tincidunt vitae. Rhoncus urna neque viverra justo nec. Interdum posuere lorem ipsum dolor. Ultrices in iaculis nunc sed augue lacus viverra.
SETTINGS_ERROR_PASSWORD_LENGTH: New password must be at least 6 characters
STAFFS_AB_DESC: Welcome back! On this page u can see our staff team. The staffs are people who try to keep the hotel safe and fun.
STAFFS_INFO_TEXT: Blaze staff are people who strive to keep the hotel safe, friendly, and fun. They are here to support you, and if you have any problems, you can go directly to a staff member to report any issue or concern.
LEADER_AB_DESC: Hi, this is the leaderboards page! Here, you can see our top players who have the most credits, diamonds, duckets, and achievement points.
NEWS_AB_DESC: This is our news page! Here, you can find the latest news about our hotel!
HELP_AB_DESC: This page provides more information about the hotel and what Blaze Hotel is all about.
//comment_HELP: The rest needs to be edited manually. Go to 'src/Components/Help/'
RESET_AB_DESC: On this page, you can easily reset your user's password.
RESET_ALERT_TEXT: Did you forget your user's password? No worries, on this page, you can easily reset your user's password! After changing your password, you will be redirected to the login page.
RESET_ERROR_PASSWORD_LENGTH: Password must be at least 6 characters
